subject: Lesson Report for Lexi (Tue Nov 21, 2023 at 07:00 PM)
body:
Lexi Lessons Report: Tue Nov 21, 2023 at 07:00 PM

Lexi warmed up with "In The Jungle", and then we played "Knocking on Heaven's Door". Lexi had practiced, so it was a ton of fun, and she did excellent.

Then, we learned the chords to Jingle Bells. She did excellent on it as well.

We made it all the way through the chords, and was able to add a strum.

I gave her an advanced strum initially, and she ran with it... however, when we added the singing it was confusing for her.

We gave her a more strait-forward strum, and were able to make it far into the song with a high accuracy.

The chords and strum are in her notebook. If she wants to explore the advanced strum, she can omit beat 3 of the strum written in her notebook.


If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:

  • Email: ggoadmusic@gmail.com
  • Phone: 336-406-1319
